Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from debt maturing in more than three months
proceeds from repayments of short term debt maturing in three months or less
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from sale of treasury stock
Repayment of Debt: repayments of debt maturing in more than three months
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: cash proceeds from split off transaction net of cash divested
proceeds from sale of productive assets
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments
proceeds from sale of other investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect
net increase decrease in cash classified within assets held for sale
net increase decrease in cash and cash equivalents including cash classified within assets held for sale

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: change in product and other insurance receivables and claims
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating capital net
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: disposal group not discontinued operation loss gain on write down
gain loss on sale of business
impairment of long lived assets and finite lived intangible assets
pension and other postretirement benefits expense reversal of expense noncash
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: payment of pension and other postretirement benefit contributions
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
